_xResult.title: Master of Art Linen Jacket and Matching Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made modern long jacket in textured linen
_xResult.longdesc:
You can only find styles like Aiste's custom linen treasures in high end boutiques - but those aren't made to measure, so why buy them there? You can import your own European style made exactly to your specifications, all the way from Lithuania, by one of the leading artisans in gorgeous sustainable linen. 

 

What's special about this design is the option to have a contrasting color in the jacket in the stitching and in the collar, and either mirror it in the pants or not.  Choose the version shown here (black/brown with harvest orange) or make your own combo.  Dramatic modern angles and collar, string tie closures. The pants have a hidden zipper with self tie. Aiste's specially structured linen pieces hold up perfectly when traveling, and are so comfy. You will get so many compliments on this outfit!

 

You have a great number of customization options with this designer!

  • Choose from 30+ colors for the base linen, the thread and the contrasting jacket color inset. 
  • The trousers have patch pockets with piping on edges, or you can have it without pockets if you prefer. If you prefer elastic waist, please specify (default is hidden zipper w/self tie).
  • Please specify length and width of pants, otherwise it will be made ankle length and full/wide leg.

 


Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing is needed before you wear this garment."

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
